name: The Bornless
storyline:
In the eerie town of Farmouth, the boundary between the human and demonic realms blurs. Rumors swirl around the Church of Orobas, a cult hidden within Farmouth, led by the formidable demon, Orobas. Their sinister agenda revolves around Mary, a woman with a unique link to The Bornless demons.

Eight individuals, each with a significant personal object, are drawn into this chaos. These relics not only unveil their histories but also grant potent abilities. Together, they must thwart the cult's apocalyptic ambitions. In this world, good and evil clash relentlessly, weaving a tale that's both haunting and enthralling.

Accompanying the launch of The Bornless Season One, we released a book, which you can read here.
summary:
The Bornless is an FPS action shooter packed with a variety of gameplay modes. Dive into last-man-standing co-op gameplay or try the thrilling demon versus disciple mode, all within a terror-filled world. Players pair up and form teams, conjure demons to aid in combat, and utilize strategic planning and resource management to survive. Whether you choose an aggressive playstyle or prefer a more cautious approach, the choice is yours.

Join or create a Faction and amass various resources to upgrade and enhance your Safehouse or personalize your gear to give a new look to your arsenal as you go to war with other Factions.

You will also experience deep lore and storyline involving all the characters within The Bornless universe, which will be revealed as facts are discovered by players.
